name: Thorn Slinger

trait.name: Adhesive Blossoms
text: The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape DC 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
At the end of each of the thorn slinger's turns, anything grappled by it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

action.name: Thorns
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 246
